name: Paper Power
description:
Become the editor of the Transmalvanian Post, the largest newspaper in the tiny country of Transmalvania. Do you use your editorial powers to support King Cyrilio or General Anzhel? Or will you be an objective source of information for your customers?

Made for Bacon Game Jam 10: https://bacongamejam.org/jams/bacongamejam-10/447/
